price: Ismaa’iil, Idriisiifi Zalkifliis (yaadadhu); hunduu obsitoota irraayi.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
